A4.text: sundials are all examples of instruments used to measure time

A5.text: timers are all examples of instruments used to measure time

A6.text: Watchmaking is a subject covered in horology literature.

A7.text: Clocks are discussed in horology treatises.

A9.text: complicated watches are especially collectible among watch enthusiasts

A10.text: Wristwatches and antique pocket watches are often appreciated as jewelry or as collectible works of art
